subject: Personal Finance
title: Mental Time Travel
description: A fast breakdown of Mental Time Travel for builders.

hook.text: Show someone an aged photo of themselves. Their retirement savings contributions increase immediately.

buildup.text: Psychologists used VR to show people their 65-year-old selves. Saving behavior changed dramatically.

discovery.text: Making the future feel vivid and real overcomes the brain's tendency to discount distant rewards.

twist.text: Writing a letter to your future self has a similar effect. Empathy for future-you drives present action.

climax.text: The more real your future feels, the more you'll sacrifice today to protect it.

punchline.text: Meet your future self. Then save for them.

quiz.question: What happened when people saw aged photos of themselves?
